parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. While the post is from Marius Dulce, who is a politician and the mayor of Calarasi, the content of the post does not refer to him as a candidate in the parliamentary elections.  The post focuses on a project related to the acquisition of electric vehicles for the Calarasi City Hall.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content is intended to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual or small group. The post discusses a public project and its impact on the city.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is to inform the public about a municipal project involving the purchase of electric vehicles. There is no explicit or implicit attempt to influence votes for any candidate in the parliamentary elections. The post highlights the mayor's actions in improving the city's infrastructure and environmental sustainability.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of citizen journalism, providing information about a public project. It presents factual information (cost, number of vehicles, intended use) and does not contain biased opinions or calls to action related to the parliamentary elections.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express personal opinions unrelated to the project. It presents factual information about a public initiative.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1727673068080776</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while from a politician, does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015. The post focuses on a municipal project unrelated to the parliamentary elections.  It informs the public about the acquisition of electric vehicles for the city hall, highlighting the environmental and economic benefits.  The content is factual, not opinion-based, and lacks any calls to action related to voting for a specific candidate.  The post's objective is to showcase the mayor's achievements in managing the city, not to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
